###############
#    Sets     #
###############
#

set SEASON :=  ;
set STORAGE :=  ;

set TECHNOLOGY := RAW_MAT_CLK RAW_MAT_CEM PROD_CLK_TRAD PROD_CEM T5CEM_PRODCEM_PROD PROD_CAL PROD_VID CARBO_PROC PROD_HIER PROD_FERRO LUBRI CERA_PAR REFR_AC ;
set TIMESLICE := All ;
set FUEL := RAW_MAT_CLK RAW_MAT_CEM CLK_PROD CEM_PROD E5_CEM_PRODCEM_PROD ;
set EMISSION := CO2e_CEM CO2e_CAL CO2e_VID CO2e_CARBONATO CO2e_HIER CO2e_FERRO CO2e_LUB CO2e_CERAS CO2e_RAC ;
set MODE_OF_OPERATION := 1 ;

#    Parameters     #
